Two careless agents generate their RSA keys using the same prime. Intercept their messages and recover the secret: 1356576530485089226537602529821126339602325888089680306397401410491403817327840725371403124470861144652104830274031604039238547252501192370430909581064237

The flag format is flag{...}
n=8335080401085340080359873263070398698737543402992334895084984384654752106080079962317385311699165848665195562836972938322488691390740494041443698843421373, n2=10021057296064685340454572439107867163362672202345330766433524426732356368271501973615645382492591380669790753315378002965015155164679089283188304766382993, e=2413048894909207434979630199007597470825228113287024510530236330818863560721645192154297924162422001082078570656322029973722388701342588024189383699860471

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{hfbvq5eu}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 1356576530485089226537602529821126339602325888089680306397401410491403817327840725371403124470861144652104830274031604039238547252501192370430909581064237
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8335080401085340080359873263070398698737543402992334895084984384654752106080079962317385311699165848665195562836972938322488691390740494041443698843421373, n2=10021057296064685340454572439107867163362672202345330766433524426732356368271501973615645382492591380669790753315378002965015155164679089283188304766382993, e=2413048894909207434979630199007597470825228113287024510530236330818863560721645192154297924162422001082078570656322029973722388701342588024189383699860471
extra_info: p=100361609932520410971049226550915596294660288213139866945914639205745593239469, q=83050485207337274589416691490088070409408052384773945681727703983807000801617, q2=99849507224948753340419362774809516886270665637980926977660640452679242180597, φ(n)=8335080401085340080359873263070398698737543402992334895084984384654752106079896550222245454013605382747154559170268869981890777578112851698254146249380288, φ(n2)=10021057296064685340454572439107867163362672202345330766433524426732356368271301762498487913328279912080465028202197072011164034370755514003529879930962928
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
